identity.name: E1 - Stealth Ops
identity.mission: Create a high-performance, utilitarian server management interface that feels like a tactical command center. No fluff, just data and control.
principles: Density is King: Maximize information density without clutter.
Matte over Gloss: No shiny gradients. Use texture and flat colors.
Green is Signal: Use green only for 'System Nominal' or 'Active' states.
Typography is UI: Use font weight and uppercase labels for hierarchy.

headings.usage: Page titles, widget headers, major metrics

body.usage: General UI text, descriptions, form labels

mono.usage: IP addresses, logs, terminal outputs, version numbers

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use #09090b or #0c0a09.
Use 1px borders (border-white/10) to define edges instead of shadows.
Green (#10b981) is the ONLY accent color. Use it for active states, success messages, and primary actions.
Text should never be pure white (#ffffff) unless it's a heading on a dark background. Use #e4e4e7 for body.

layout.structure: Sidebar Navigation + Top Bar + Main Content Area

grid.widgets: Bento grid style. Mix of col-span-1 and col-span-2 items.

sidebar.behavior: Fixed on desktop, collapsible drawer on mobile

button.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-medium uppercase tracking-wide text-xs h-9 px-4 shadow-none
button.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-sm font-medium text-xs h-9 px-4

input.style: bg-background border-input rounded-sm focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary h-9 text-sm

badge.style: rounded-sm px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines if possible. Use thin strokes (strokeWidth={1.5}).

visual_enhancers.glass: Use 'backdrop-blur-md' for the sidebar and sticky headers, but keep opacity high (bg-background/80) to maintain legibility.
visual_enhancers.texture: Optional: Add a very subtle noise texture to the background if it feels too flat.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Stroke width 1.5px. Small size (w-4 h-4) for UI elements.

images.description: Abstract green digital pattern with vertical lines. Use for Login Page background with overlay.
Rack of electronic equipment in a dark room. Use for 'No Apps Installed' or 'Server Offline' states.

motion.usage: Micro-interactions only. Hover states, button clicks, toast appearances. No sweeping page transitions.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #e4e4e7 on dark backgrounds. Avoid dark gray text on dark gray backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) are mandatory for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.labels: All icon-only buttons must have aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/barlow-condensed', '@fontsource/ibm-plex-sans', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specified font families and color palette.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Modify /components/ui/button.jsx, card.jsx, input.jsx to match the 'rounded-sm' and 'border-border' style. Remove default shadows.
4. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar. Use this for all protected routes.
5. LOGIN PAGE: Use the 'login_background' image with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80) so the form is readable.
6. CHARTS: When implementing charts, use the 'primary' color (#10b981) for the main data line/bar.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links). Format: 'page-section-element'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid matte colors.
Do not center align the app container.
